docs.text: Notes ¶ Here is a collection of my shared notes, which use the zettelkasten method for linking between ideas and thoughts. Generally, I've organized my notes below based on areas that I find recurring in my academic life. Arrhythmology Molecular pathways Genetic mechanisms Computational Machine learning Signal processing methods Epidemiology Biostatistics Causal theory
